Ultra Video Converter is a Powerful Video tool to convert all popular Video formats to AVI, MPEG, VCD, DVD, WMV, ASF, MP4, 3GP formats. The main features include: adjust output video quality, adjust 4:3 or 16:9 video aspect, add subtitile onto the output video, all encoders / codec are built-in and any supported conversion can be done once you downloading the software. Fast conversion speeds and high quality, simple GUI and very EASY to use.
